snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 233: When Tails Gets Bored (Special Edition) (SAGE2001)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos) (I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: When Tails Gets Bored - Special Edition
Credit: Matt Newman (Sonic Vegemite/Matt the Yak aka Estel)
Release Date: Possibly 2000/2001

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: http://info.sonicretro.org/images/e/e1/When_Tails_Gets_Bored.zip

00:00:00 - Splash Screen
00:00:06 - Title Screen
00:00:36 - Sky Choice Zone
00:02:25 - Minimalist Madness Zone Act 1 & Title Card Zone 1
00:04:19 - Cutscene 1
00:04:54 - Minimalist Madness Zone Act 2
00:07:12 - Cutscene 2
00:07:46 - Kakashta no Kyuuden-Zone Act 1 & Title Card Zone 2
00:10:40 - Cutscene 3
00:11:14 - Kakashta no Kyuuden-Zone Act 2
00:12:38 - Cutscene 4
00:13:12 - Emerald Hill Zone Act 1 & Title Card Zone 3
00:17:03 - Cutscene 5
00:17:37 - Emerald Hill Zone Act 2
00:20:03 - Cutscene 6
00:21:12 - Resort Island Zone
00:22:15 - Cutscene 7
00:22:49 - Clone Valley Zone Act 1
00:26:41 - Cutscene 8
00:27:15 - Clone Valley Zone Act 2 & Title Card Zone 4
00:31:54 - Boss
00:33:46 - Cutscene 9
00:34:21 - Lunch Base Zone Act 1
00:36:38 - Cutscene 10
00:37:14 - Lunch Base Zone Act 2
00:40:25 - Cutscene 11
00:41:06 - Cutscene 12
00:41:40 - Cutscene 13
00:42:21 - Another Doomsday Zone
00:45:41 - Ending
00:46:49 - Credits

(EXTRA)
00:49:25 - Cheat Island Zone
00:50:51 - Beta Blowout Zone
00:51:43 - Speed Highway Zone
00:55:54 - Lunch Base Stash
00:57:37 - Secret Scene
01:00:45 - Kakashta no Kyuuden 1 (Normal)
01:01:54 - Emerald Hill 1 (Normal)
01:02:43 - Clone Valley 2 (Normal)
01:04:32 - Minimalist Madness (Normal)

NOTES: Welp, i cannot lie... This game was pretty boring.
Yeah that's it end of Notes section.
...
...
...
Okay fine, for a hoax type of game it's surprisingly fun and simoly a little bit annoying when game engine bugs ruin your fun.
I do like the Cheats unlock system tho.

(PASSWORDS)
